channel.title: Counter strike help
channel.description:
hi i wanted to start playing CS.. but i was juss wondering if i downloaded counter strike off a torrent would i still be able to fight against my friends that have bought the game or would the downloaded version not let me play on the original servers..? i have a list of cd keys n serials.. but i was juss wondering if it would work or not.
thanks :)

item.title: Counter strike help
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

Search: Digitalzone Counter Strike Source
Just download that and you will be able to play on non-steam servers.

Read full topic
